text: TITLE: What is the max attachment size? | QUESTION: I tried uploading a 40MB file and it failed.

meta.title: What is the max attachment size?

text: TITLE: What is the max attachment size? | REPLY by user1 (upvotes=3): I think it’s 50MB.

text: TITLE: API key expired after 30 days? | QUESTION: Mine stopped working after a month.
TITLE: API key expired after 30 days? | REPLY by devFan (upvotes=2): Keys never expire.
TITLE: API key expired after 30 days? | REPLY by techAmy (upvotes=10): Docs say 60 days.
TITLE: Rate limit question | QUESTION: What is the hourly API rate limit?
TITLE: Rate limit question | REPLY by alpha (upvotes=4): I thought it was 200/hour.
TITLE: Rate limit question | REPLY by beta (upvotes=9): I believe it's 300/hour now.
